thread.section_title: Motorama Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Motorama | motorama.com.au
thread.title: Fanita

author: Fanita
title: Fanita
text: The service of picking up my new Toyota Corolla Hybrid was good but missing that was ordered was the back Hatch back Mat. I don't think this should have occurred. All Staff were friendly and Glen Staff Member was very obliging assisting us in every way he could. This is my third new Toyota Vehicle and hopefully the service will continue to be good as I have never experienced this particular dealer. I would also like to thank Ben from the Service Section whom I found to be very knowledgable in the area of GPS, Bluetooth, Radio etc. He had a lot of patience with me and sorted everything out without telling me he is busy and will get back to me. He came out straight away two or three times which I greatly appreciate explaining everything I needed to know.
